properties.description: The space is open to all but we have an 11+ age range We have 10 free crafting spaces but you are welcome to just sit and chat and have a tea.

properties.description: Everyone is welcome, including dogs. Our caf√© is open during the listed opening hours but there is no obligation for those needing a warm space to purchase anything. We have books to borrow, board games, jigsaws, art on exhibition, a kids corner and a piano.
